meanings.sent1: I really like the typeface used in that book.
meanings.sent2: The typeface of the logo is very modern and sleek.
meanings.sent3: The typeface on the menu made the prices look fancier than they really were.
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting was like a unique typeface, each letter standing out.
meanings.sent5: The typeface of the sign was so bold, it caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: The style or design of a set of characters.
meanings.sent1: The typeface of the website was easy to read.
meanings.sent2: The typeface used in the newspaper was traditional and classic.
meanings.sent3: The typeface on the birthday card made the message more cheerful.
meanings.sent4: His smile was like a typeface, warm and inviting.
meanings.sent5: The typeface of the poster was so vibrant, it drew people in.
